0.0.4.en: Added more product ID's to devices

0.0.6.en: Patch for Temp/Hum Sensor not updating (unit needs to be removed and paired again)

0.0.7.en: Added settings for Temp/Hum Sensor interval/change

0.0.12.en: Added 2 Gang Wall Switch and 3 Gang Wall Switch (white label)

0.0.20.en: Patch for ZBMini (and other wired devices) not reporting device offline. Adding ProdictId variants to Motion Sensor (SNZB-03).

0.0.22.en: Added Plug S26 and switch module ZBMini-L. Added reverse logic to door/window sensor.

0.0.24.en: Typo fixed. Added SNZB-02D and ZBMINIL2

0.0.25.en: Added SNZB-02P and made a change from light to socket class as default for light devices

0.0.26.en: Fix, sensors not reporting / timing out

0.0.33.en: Fix for SNZB-06P and added ability to set timer for the reset of the contact alarm capability

0.0.35.en: Improvements to attributeReportingConfig and fix to saving settings for TH01/SNZB-02/SNZB-02D/SNZB-02P/ZBMINI-L

0.0.38.en: Corrected names, updated icons and info

0.0.40.en: Some fixes and rewrites of beta drivers
